attributes.action: Acknowledgement to Mr Keneth Dalglish for his services to sport and the Community
attributes.additional_details:
To bestow on Kenny Dalglish a Knighthood for his services and contribution to Sport.This would also recognise his unstinting loyalty and work on behalf of the Hillsborough families during these past 22 years.
This family man knows the heatbreak these families suffered and attended every funeral during this sad time.He is not only an excellent ambassador for Liverpool Football Club but more importantly for the communities and people of Merseyside
